note.p: This Basis for Conclusions accompanies, but is not part of the Conceptual Framework for Financial Reporting (Conceptual Framework). It summarises the considerations of the International Accounting Standards Board (Board) in developing the Conceptual Framework. Individual Board members gave greater weight to some factors than to others.
